attributes.action: Allow 18-30 year olds government funding to buy a property and secure a deposit.
attributes.background: Many young people at the moment that are working full time or have a family such as a son or daughter earning  good money are not able to buy a property as they can’t raise the money to secure a deposit on a property.

rejection.details:
The Government already has schemes to help first-time buyers, so we're not sure exactly what further action you'd like to see.

For example, you can find out about the "Help to Buy" scheme here:

https://www.helptobuy.gov.uk/

You could start a new petition asking for the specific support you'd like to see.
